Description:
This discussion at Microsoft Ignite between Adam and Steve Dertien from PTC, focuses on how AI and automation are transforming engineering, manufacturing, and product development. Key topics include the application of AI to boost productivity, manage complex requirements, and streamline processes in industries like automotive, with examples from BMW and Volkswagen.

Visit the Manufacturing AI site: https://msft.it/6054tfQ3o

#Manufacturing #IndustrialAI #ManufacturingAI #AITransformation
Title: The New Industrialists | PTC - driving industrial innovation through advanced analytics
Author: Microsoft Cloud
